pullRequest.title: Issue #1542: Support several contextual preferences at the same level
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR provides implementation for #1542.
It allows to resolve contextual preferences if they are specified at the same level with the same value.

commit.message: Issue #1542: Support several contextual preferences at the same level if all of them has the same value.

nodes.bodyText: We can get rid of MessageConstants.WARN_CONTEXTUAL_PREFERENCE_REDUCER_NOT_FOUND now.

commit.message: Issue #1542: Support several contextual preferences at the same level if all of them has the same value - clean up
